channel.title: Rap742 V2 Drygores|| Custom Bosses || DDOS protected VPS 24/7|| Dungeoneering||
channel.description:
Rap742 V2 has just been released, and it's an entirely different source I'm using. We are currently powered by a DDOS protected VPS 5GB ram, and have no lag. As of now, we have Auto donation, Auto vote, and highscores. We also have a [COLOR="#FF8C00"]Halloween Event [/COLOR]which was released a few days ago, and it's pretty fun :P
Our website is: [url=http://Rap742.com]Rap742[/url] We have a webclient, and a desktop client which is more convenient. On average there is about 15+ players everyday, and hoping to get more :)
Download are client at: [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/3iqgf0ux5gixwph/Rap742.Jar"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/3iqgf0ux5gixwph/Rap742.Jar[/URL]
Play are webclient at: [url=http://rap742.com/webclient/]Rap742[/url]
Here are some screenshots of the server:
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img191/3639/ggdp.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img819/5063/xcwj.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img823/539/0e7k.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img812/433/ii61.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img43/3470/gnti.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img854/504/8tyt.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img833/2987/a0gm.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img802/884/dwpm.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img197/8498/voit.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img21/1613/d94d.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img30/3442/ehsz.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img14/7157/mrbb.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img443/2218/7smb.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img11/2833/689u.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img22/9269/y91u.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img819/5264/ncch.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img34/4988/eia8.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img580/5451/jbid.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img29/8761/vjw3.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img833/1491/699p.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img545/1492/1ur1.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img833/4369/ar1t.png[/img]
There is also:
[COLOR="#0000FF"]QBD Duel Arena Dominion Tower Pk Points + Shop Revenants 5+ Slayer Towers Donator Zone Gambling Polypore Dungeon Tormented Demons All Skills Working! Glacors All Drygores+ Chaotic claws![/COLOR]
